name: Hakuna Matata Solutions Pvt Ltd
description:
Hakuna Matata Solutions is a 13-year old leading Digital Transformation Company offering a full spectrum of innovative technology solutions and services like IoT, RPA, AI, Chabot, Mobility, Web, Cloud, for enterprises across different industry verticals all over the globe.
Our mission is to be (a) the world’s best app maker, (b) serve as the first choice digital transformation partner for enterprises across geographies, industries and sizes, (c) enable our customers to succeed in the rapidly changing digital landscape through our leading-edge competencies in Mobile, Web, Cloud, DevOps, RPA, IoT, AI and (d) deliver ‘happiness through excellence’ to our people, customers, investors and partners.
Our expertise is defined by 13+ years of experience in developing mission-critical apps for the new economy, 220+ clients, 250+ apps, and 500,000 hours of development work.
We focus on making mobility a game-changer for businesses and consumers. We are passionate about creating futuristic app solutions coupled with future technologies like IoT, RPA, AI to engage users and deliver tangible ROI.
Our clients include some of the most respected business houses, exciting start-ups, as well as global enterprises. Our apps are being used by more than 25 million+ customers across the world.
